name: Nush
body:
_Nush_ is a traditional, coffeebreak roguelike set in a lightweight science-fiction universe. You play a treasure hunter who has landed on a former human colony, home to an important research base. Your purpose is to delve the complex and find the Core of Nushangthmpfz, a powerful artifact which is said to be an infinite energy source.

The game is in development, so any contributions are highly appreciated. Be sure to send in any bugs you may encounter, and also any suggestions you may have!

The roguelike is licensed under the terms and conditions of the Simplified BSD License, so you're free to fork the project on GitHub if you'd like to lend a hand.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
